page.title: 10Interview with a mother
page.content: Why not? Some of the shops are expensive because there isn't much competition.I use Stevenson's the butchers.I buy my vegetables at Moody's.They are expensive but they are nice. I buy my bread there too. I buy the bulk of my shopping at South Shields.It is cheaper there.The Liptons in Whitburn is very expensive. What do you do in your spare time? Well I'm not very active.I just like to knit or read or go for a walk. Are the people in Whitburn friendly? They are when you belong here.But my husband didn't come here till we got married and he says it takes a while to get used to you but they are alright now. In what way are they friendly? They seem to be interested in you.I could rely on my neighbours to help me
